name: Gale Reef
description: Gale Reef is a serene getaway with vibrant marine life and crystal clear waters perfect for snorkeling and marine exploration.

name: Dawson's Reef
description: Dawson's Reef features vibrant coral formations and a thriving underwater ecosystem. A diver's paradise!

name: Claire's Reef
description: Claire's Reef offers tranquil views and secluded beaches. Ideal for peaceful reflection or nature walks.
